00030 class PixelBox : public MC2BoundingBox 
00031 {   
00032 public:
00036    inline PixelBox();
00037    
00043    inline PixelBox( const MC2Point& aCorner,
00044                     const MC2Point& otherCorner );
00045    
00050    inline PixelBox( const isab::Rectangle& rectangle );
00051 
00052 #ifdef __SYMBIAN32__
00053 
00056    inline PixelBox( const TRect& trect ) {
00057       minLat = trect.iTl.iY;
00058       maxLat = trect.iBr.iY;
00059       maxLon = trect.iBr.iX;
00060       minLon = trect.iTl.iX;
00061       cos_lat = 0;
00062    }
00063 #endif

00134 // --- Implementation of inlined methods ---
00135 
00136 
00137 inline int
00138 PixelBox::pointInside( const MC2Point& point ) const
00139 {
00140    return inside( point.getY(), point.getX() );
00141 }
00142 
00143 inline void
00144 PixelBox::set(const MC2Point& aCorner, const MC2Point& oppositCorner)
00145 {
00146    maxLat = MAX( aCorner.getY(), oppositCorner.getY() );
00147    minLat = MIN( aCorner.getY(), oppositCorner.getY() );
00148    maxLon = MAX( aCorner.getX(), oppositCorner.getX() );
00149    minLon = MIN( aCorner.getX(), oppositCorner.getX() );
00150 }
00151 
00152 inline
00153 PixelBox::PixelBox() : MC2BoundingBox()
00154 {
00155    cos_lat = 1.0;
00156 }
00157 
00158 inline 
00159 PixelBox::PixelBox( const MC2Point& aCorner, const MC2Point& otherCorner )
00160   : MC2BoundingBox(false, false)
00161 {   
00162    cos_lat = 1.0;
00163    set(aCorner, otherCorner);
00164 }
00165 
00166 inline
00167 PixelBox::PixelBox( const isab::Rectangle& rectangle )
00168   : MC2BoundingBox( false, false )
00169 {
00170    cos_lat = 1.0;
00171    minLat = rectangle.getY();
00172    minLon = rectangle.getX();
00173    maxLat = minLat + rectangle.getHeight();
00174    maxLon = minLon + rectangle.getWidth();
00175 }
00176 
00177 inline MC2Point
00178 PixelBox::getCenterPoint() const
00179 {
00180    return MC2Point( minLon + ( (maxLon - minLon) >> 1 ),
00181                     minLat + ( (maxLat - minLat) >> 1 ) );
00182 }
00183 
00184 inline MC2Point
00185 PixelBox::getTopLeft() const
00186 {
00187    return MC2Point( getMinLon(), getMinLat() );
00188 }
00189 inline MC2Point
00190 PixelBox::getBottomLeft() const
00191 {
00192    return MC2Point( getMinLon(), getMaxLat() );
00193 }
00194 
00195 inline MC2Point
00196 PixelBox::getBottomRight() const
00197 {
00198    return MC2Point( getMaxLon(), getMaxLat() );
00199 }
00200 
00201 inline MC2Point
00202 PixelBox::getTopRight() const
00203 {
00204    return MC2Point( getMaxLon(), getMinLat() );
00205 }
00206 
00207 inline MC2Point
00208 PixelBox::getCorner(int nbr) const
00209 {
00210    switch ( nbr & 3 ) {
00211       case 0:
00212          return getTopLeft();
00213       case 1:
00214          return getBottomLeft();
00215       case 2:
00216          return getBottomRight();
00217       default:
00218          return getTopRight();
00219    }
00220 }
00221 
00222 inline void
00223 PixelBox::update(const MC2Point& point)
00224 {
00225    MC2BoundingBox::update( point.getY(), point.getX(), false );
00226 }
00227 
00228 inline void
00229 PixelBox::update(const PixelBox& other)
00230 {
00231    update( other.getTopRight() );
00232    update( other.getBottomLeft() );
00233 }
00234 
00235 inline PixelBox&
00236 PixelBox::move( const MC2Point& deltas )
00237 {
00238    minLon += deltas.getX();
00239    maxLon += deltas.getX();
00240    minLat += deltas.getY();
00241    maxLat += deltas.getY();
00242    return *this;
00243 }
00244 
00245 inline PixelBox::operator isab::Rectangle() const
00246 {
00247    return isab::Rectangle( minLon, minLat, getLonDiff(), getHeight() );
00248 }
00249 
00250 #ifdef __SYMBIAN32__
00251 inline PixelBox::operator TRect() const
00252 {
00253    return TRect( getTopLeft(), getBottomRight() );
00254 }
00255 #endif // __SYMBIAN32__
00256 
00257 inline PixelBox&
00258 PixelBox::moveTopLeftTo(const MC2Point& topLeft)
00259 {
00260    return move( topLeft - getTopLeft() );
00261 }
00262 
00263 inline PixelBox&
00264 PixelBox::moveBottomLeftTo(const MC2Point& bottomLeft)
00265 {
00266    return move( bottomLeft - getBottomLeft() );
00267 }
00268 
00269 inline PixelBox&
00270 PixelBox::moveBottomRightTo(const MC2Point& bottomRight)
00271 {
00272    return move( bottomRight - getBottomRight() );
00273 }
00274 
00275 inline PixelBox&
00276 PixelBox::moveTopRightTo(const MC2Point& topRight)
00277 {
00278    return move( topRight - getTopRight() );
00279 }
00280 
00281 inline PixelBox&
00282 PixelBox::moveCenterTo(const MC2Point& newCenter)
00283 {
00284    return move( newCenter - getCenterPoint() );
00285 }
00286 
00287 inline MC2Point 
00288 PixelBox::snapToBox( PixelBox& otherBox ) const
00289 {
00290    // Not that this method won't work if otherBox does not
00291    // fit inside this box.
00292 
00293    MC2Point p( 0, 0 );
00294 
00295    // Check left boundary.
00296    int delta = otherBox.getMinLon() - getMinLon();
00297    if ( delta < 0 ) {
00298       p.getX() = delta;
00299    } else {
00300       // Check right.
00301       delta = otherBox.getMaxLon() - getMaxLon();
00302       if ( delta > 0 ) {
00303          p.getX() = delta;
00304       }
00305    }
00306 
00307    // Check top boundary.
00308    delta = otherBox.getMinLat() - getMinLat();
00309    if ( delta < 0 ) {
00310       p.getY() = delta;
00311    } else {
00312       // Check bottom.
00313       delta = otherBox.getMaxLat() - getMaxLat();
00314       if ( delta > 0 ) {
00315          p.getY() = delta;
00316       }
00317    }
00318 
00319    // Now move to the correct position.
00320    otherBox.move( MC2Point( -p.getX(), -p.getY() ) );
00321 
00322    return p;
00323 }
00324 
00325 #endif
